verbs.description: [ARG0: Some of U.S. President Donald Trump 's closest conservative allies in Congress] [V: called] [ARG1: for the appointment of a second special counsel on Tuesday to investigate the probe into Trump 's campaign , Russia and the 2016 U.S. election] , [ARGM-TMP: as Trump ramped up his own criticism of the Department of Justice] .

Some of U.S. President Donald Trump 's closest conservative allies in Congress called for the appointment of [ARG0: a second special counsel] on Tuesday to [V: investigate] [ARG1: the probe into Trump 's campaign , Russia and the 2016 U.S. election] , as Trump ramped up his own criticism of the Department of Justice .

Some of U.S. President Donald Trump 's closest conservative allies in Congress called for the appointment of a second special counsel on Tuesday to investigate the probe into Trump 's campaign , Russia and the 2016 U.S. election , as [ARG0: Trump] [V: ramped] up [ARG1: his own criticism of the Department of Justice] .
